name: Import items from csv to Existing Orders for WooCommerce
author: Jcodex

sections.description:
WooCommerce is most powerfull ecommerce tool for WordPress sites. ‘Import items from csv to Existing WooCommerce Orders’ is extension for add bulk products/items from csv with Product SKU into existing orders or manually created WooCommerce orders by store manager. You have to make sure Sku’s you will use in csv are must exist on your store, plugin will skip missing sku’s and will not import those items to the order, it will only import that products item are existing on your store. This plugin is very easy to use Import items from csv to Existing Orders for WooCommerce will create an option button CSV Import next to builtin add item(s) button of WooCommerce on orders pages in WooCommerce admin.

Sample CSV Format

Download CSV Sample

|      Sku      | Price | Quantity |
| 3101BK37 |    20    |      1      |
| 58DBK05 |    300    |      4      |
| 90DBK74 |    250    |      4      |

Features

  • Import Bluk products from csv
  • Confirmation popup before importing the items.
  • Add custom prices for existing items
  • Easy to use

If You have any Issue Contact Us
sections.installation:
1. From the Dashboard:
  2. Plugins
  3. Add New
  4. Search plugins -> “Import items from csv to Existing Orders for WooCommerce”
  5. Install Now
  6. Activate
  7. Go to Dashboard:-> WooCommerce -> Orders -> Add order OR
    Dashboard:-> WooCommerce -> Orders -> Edit order

short_description: A tool for easily import bulk products / items from csv into existing WooCommerce orders.
